# FluxReve - Complete AI Image Generation Platform Guide

> Professional AI-powered image generation with multiple state-of-the-art models

## About FluxReve

FluxReve is a comprehensive AI image generation platform designed for creators, designers, and businesses. Our platform provides access to multiple cutting-edge AI models, enabling users to generate high-quality images from text descriptions or transform existing images.

## Platform Overview

### Text-to-Image Generation
Transform your ideas into stunning visuals by describing what you want to create. Our AI models understand natural language and generate high-quality images that match your descriptions.

### Image-to-Image Transformation
Upload existing images and use AI to transform them with new styles, enhance quality, or create variations while maintaining the core elements of your original image.

## Available AI Models

### Nano Banana Pro
- **Type**: Text-to-Image, Image-to-Image
- **Strengths**: Fast generation, high quality output, latest technology
- **Best For**: General-purpose image creation, quick iterations
- **Resolution Options**: 1K, 2K, 4K

### Z-Image
- **Type**: Text-to-Image
- **Strengths**: Photorealistic rendering, accurate text rendering in images, sub-second generation
- **Best For**: Realistic images, images with text, fast prototyping
- **Features**: NSFW content support, ultra-fast generation

### Flux 2 Pro
- **Type**: Text-to-Image, Image-to-Image
- **Strengths**: Professional-grade quality, versatile style handling
- **Best For**: High-end creative work, commercial projects
- **Resolution**: Up to 1024x1024

### Seedream 4.5
- **Type**: Text-to-Image, Image-to-Image
- **Strengths**: Ultra-high quality, large resolution output, creative generation
- **Best For**: High-resolution artwork, detailed illustrations, educational content
- **Resolution**: Up to 2048x2048
- **Developer**: ByteDance

## Pricing & Credits

FluxReve uses a credit-based system. Credits are consumed per generation based on the model and settings used.

### Credit Consumption
- Nano Banana Pro: 100-170 credits per image (varies by resolution)
- Z-Image: 5 credits per image
- Flux 2 Pro: 25 credits per image
- Seedream 4.5: 30 credits per image

### Subscription Plans
- **Free**: Daily free credits for trying the service
- **Basic**: Monthly/yearly subscription with generous credit allocation
- **Pro**: Higher credit limits and priority features

For detailed pricing, visit: /pricing

## Multi-Language Support

FluxReve is available in:
- English (en)
- 简体中文 (zh-CN)
- 繁體中文 (zh-TW)
- 日本語 (ja)

## Technical Information

### Supported Image Formats
- Output: JPEG, PNG, WebP
- Input (for image-to-image): JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF

### API Integration
FluxReve provides API access for developers to integrate AI image generation into their applications.

## Content Sharing

Generated images can be shared publicly via unique share links. Public shares are indexed by search engines. Users can set images as private to prevent public access.

### Content Moderation
- NSFW content detection and labeling
- Age verification for sensitive content
- Private mode for personal creations

## User Dashboard

Registered users can access:
- Generation history
- Credit balance and usage
- Subscription management
- Account settings
